PHLOX: How Projection Walls Work
2
1
PHLOX: Projection walls allow Nomai to talk to each other without being in the same place. It's a wonderful technology for talking to friends from far away!
3
2
PHLOX: To use a projection wall, a projection stone must be placed into its pedestal. This connects the projection wall to the stone's corresponding projection wall, sharing anything written on both walls!
4
3
PHLOX: Incoming messages from the other projection wall are written in an orange color! This makes it easy to always tell which side is talking.
5
4
FILIX: Well done, Phlox! But did you know the projection walls are a newer version of the way our Vessel communications used to work?
6
5
PHLOX: Really? My father has never told me about that!
7
6
FILIX: It's true! Though we are unable to connect to the Vessels' communication network, our projection walls were an iteration of their design, which separated incoming and outgoing messages into different walls.

3
PHLOX: New projection stones are crafted at the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop</color> every day, allowing us to talk and project from more and more places!
